response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, we propose a special introductory offer of $10,000 for this product. We are confident that this price reflects both the product's worth and the opportunity for you to experience its advantages at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 10000}
